entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:53 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 02:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

Temperature: -30.3°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
